meta.name: viewport
meta.content: viewport-fit=cover, width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no

div.class: col_menu col-lg-4 align-self-center text-center d-none d-lg-block
col_side_menu col-lg-4 col-sm-8 col-6 isLoggedIn align-self-center align-right

input.placeholder: Search by project name, coin ticker or contract address
